content: Popular **tourist attractions in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)** include the following: ## Beaches and bays - [East Coast Park](/wiki/East_Coast_Park) - [Marina Bay](/wiki/Marina_Bay,_Singapore) - [Palawan Beach](/wiki/Sentosa) - [Siloso Beach](/wiki/Sentosa) - [Changi Beach](/wiki/Changi_Beach) ## Cultural centres - [China Cultural Centre](/wiki/China_Cultural_Centre_(Singapore)) ## Educational centres - [Science Centre Singapore](/wiki/Science_Centre_Singapore) - [Singapore Discovery Centre](/wiki/Singapore_Discovery_Centre) - [ArtScience Museum](/wiki/ArtScience_Museum) ## Entertainment districts - [Boat Quay](/wiki/Boat_Quay) - [Clarke Quay](/wiki/Clarke_Quay) ## Hills - [Bukit Timah](/wiki/Bukit_Timah) - [Mount Faber](/wiki/Mount_Faber) ## Historical buildings - [Baba House](/wiki/Baba_House) - [City Hall](/wiki/City_Hall,_Singapore) - [Empress Place Building](/wiki/Empress_Place_Building) - [Fort Canning](/wiki/Fort_Canning) - [Fort Siloso](/wiki/Fort_Siloso) - [House of Tan Yeok Nee](/wiki/House_of_Tan_Yeok_Nee) - [Raffles Hotel](/wiki/Raffles_Hotel) - [Sri Temasek](/wiki/Sri_Temasek) - [Sun Yat Sen Nanyang Memorial Hall](/wiki/Sun_Yat_Sen_Nanyang_Memorial_Hall) - [Victoria Theatre and Concert Hall](/wiki/Victoria_Theatre_and_Concert_Hall) ## Infrastructure - [Marina Barrage](/wiki/Marina_Barrage) - [URA City Gallery](/wiki/Urban_Redevelopment_Authority) - [Fountain of Wealth](/wiki/Fountain_of_Wealth) ## Islands - [Sentosa Island](/wiki/Sentosa_Island) ## Museums ## Nature - [Sungei Buloh Wetland Reserve](/wiki/Sungei_Buloh_Wetland_Reserve) ## Parks ## Religious places - [Thian Hock Keng](/wiki/Thian_Hock_Keng) - [Yueh Hai Ching Temple](/wiki/Yueh_Hai_Ching_Temple) - [Hong San See](/wiki/Hong_San_See) - [Tan Si Chong Su](/wiki/Tan_Si_Chong_Su) or Poh Chiak Keng - [Kwan Im Thong Hood Cho Temple](/wiki/Kwan_Im_Thong_Hood_Cho_Temple) - [Burmese Buddhist Temple](/wiki/Burmese_Buddhist_Temple) - [Wat Ananda Metyarama Thai Buddhist Temple](/wiki/Wat_Ananda_Metyarama_Thai_Buddhist_Temple) - [Sri Lankaramaya Buddhist Temple](/wiki/Sri_Lankaramaya_Buddhist_Temple) - [Lian Shan Shuang Lin Monastery](/wiki/Siong_Lim_Temple) - [Kong Meng San Phor Kark See Monastery](/wiki/Kong_Meng_San_Phor_Kark_See_Monastery) - [Foo Hai Ch'an Monastery](/wiki/Foo_Hai_Ch%27an_Monastery) - [Buddha Tooth Relic Temple and Museum](/wiki/Buddha_Tooth_Relic_Temple_and_Museum) - [Sri Thendayuthapani Temple](/wiki/Sri_Thendayuthapani_Temple) - [Sri Mariamman Temple](/wiki/Sri_Mariamman_Temple,_Singapore) - [Armenian Church, Singapore](/wiki/Armenian_Church,_Singapore) - [Maghain Aboth Synagogue](/wiki/Maghain_Aboth_Synagogue) - [Sultan Mosque](/wiki/Masjid_Sultan) - [Qi Tian Gong](/wiki/Qi_Tian_Gong) ## Integrated resorts - [Marina Bay Sands](/wiki/Marina_Bay_Sands) - [Resorts World Sentosa](/wiki/Resorts_World_Sentosa) ## Rivers ## Shopping centers ## Shopping districts - [Arab Street](/wiki/Arab_Street) - [Bugis Street](/wiki/Bugis_Street) - [Chinatown](/wiki/Chinatown,_Singapore) - [Little India](/wiki/Little_India,_Singapore) - [Orchard Road](/wiki/Orchard_Road) ## Sports - [National Stadium](/wiki/National_Stadium,_Singapore) - [Singapore Indoor Stadium](/wiki/Singapore_Indoor_Stadium) ## Theaters - [Esplanade â€“ Theatres on the Bay](/wiki/Esplanade_%E2%80%93_Theatres_on_the_Bay) ## Theme parks - [Haw Par Villa](/wiki/Haw_Par_Villa) - Adventure Cove - [Universal Studios Singapore](/wiki/Universal_Studios_Singapore) - [Wild Wild Wet](/wiki/Wild_Wild_Wet) ## Tours - [Royal Albatross](/wiki/Royal_Albatross_(ship)) ## Trails - [Helix Bridge](/wiki/The_Helix_Bridge) - [Southern Ridges](/wiki/Southern_Ridges) ## Zoos - [Bird Paradise](/wiki/Bird_Paradise) - [Night Safari](/wiki/Night_Safari,_Singapore) - [River Wonders](/wiki/River_Wonders) - [Singapore Zoo](/wiki/Singapore_Zoo) - [Tourism in Singapore](/wiki/Tourism_in_Singapore)
title: List of tourist attractions in Singapore
